basic.floral_language:
Sedum clavatum
Floriography: goodly, novel, beautiful
Several individuals often grow in a cluster, fresh green to bule green leaves in an oval shape, slightly tipped, leaves are in a rosette, surface has a layer of white powders, in a cool season with abundant sunlight, leaf tips turn red.
Likes sunny places, has a short dormant period under summer high temperature, need place under scattered light. Flowers sometimes, white color.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, white flowers
basic.color: Leaf color emerald green, when sunny leaf tips red

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, dormant in summer under high temperatures, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once every 1-2 months in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
